table_description: Represents the policy for enabling or disabling the Azure AD admin consent workflow.

columns.name: is_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the admin consent request feature is enabled or disabled.

columns.name: notify_reviewers
columns.description: Specifies whether reviewers will receive notifications.

columns.name: reminders_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether reviewers will receive reminder emails.

columns.name: request_duration_in_days
columns.description: Specifies the duration the request is active before it automatically expires if no decision is applied.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Specifies the version of this policy. When the policy is updated, this version is updated.

columns.name: reviewers
columns.description: The list of reviewers for the admin consent.
